definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

sentences.english: Rain implant in the serious rain boots.
Jan's office conveyed an impression of efficiency and seriousness.
sentences.chinese: 简的办公室给人留下高效和庄重的印象。

sentences.english: He gave his solemn promise to do better.
sentences.chinese: 他庄重地保证把事情办好。

sentences.english: Each graduate behaved with gravity at it.
sentences.chinese: 每个毕业生都举止庄重。

sentences.english: Pierce's open, freckled face was grave.
sentences.chinese: 皮尔斯那张有雀斑的大脸庞显得严肃庄重。

sentences.english: A stronger oath yet is the one that is repeated 50times.
sentences.chinese: 不过，另一种还要庄重的誓言就是重复50遍。

sentences.english: His golden hair and magnific manner made him very attractive.
sentences.chinese: 他金色的头发和庄重的神态使他非常具有非凡的魅力。

sentences.english: I will be immortalized in a much more dignified fashion.
sentences.chinese: 我将在这更庄重的时尚中得到永生。

sentences.english: My roommates stood up and saw me off solemnly, as if I were heading for the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 室友们全体起立，庄重地送我，像赴战场。

sentences.english: I solemnly pledge myself to devote my life to the service of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 我庄重地宣誓要把我的一生献给人道主义事业。

sentences.english: He spoke in a voice that was grave and almost bass.
sentences.chinese: 他说话的声音是庄重的，几乎是低沉的。

sentences.english: Actually, much of it is solemn and melancholy.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，大多数都是庄重和忧郁的。

sentences.english: And Europe, for its part, has a solemn obligation to keep that road open.
sentences.chinese: 而欧洲，会庄重地承诺将通向这条道路的大门敞开。

sentences.english: Looking at those majestic and lofty figures of Buddha, could one ever tell how Buddhism in Dunhuang is influenced by alien arts?
sentences.chinese: 一尊尊美丽庄重的佛像，有哪些域外艺术的影响？

sentences.english: He sailed into the meeting place with his head up.
sentences.chinese: 他昂着头庄重地步进会场。
